message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

This paper discusses confidentiality attacks on cryptocurrency off-chain networks, which involve analyzing the flow of transactions to infer sensitive information. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of gossip and probing mechanisms, which are related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes remediations for scenarios in which the attacks are successful, which involves machine learning techniques (cs.LG).
